channel.description: Recent content in home on Tech Blog - Acesyde

item.title: How to automate your swimming pool
item.description: Having a pool is a good idea because previous summers have been so hot, as well as for relaxing after work, but in the other hand, it can be very useful to limit the power consumption of the pool pump motor.

item.title: How to automate your gate
item.description: Since I built my house I want to automate everything and now it’s time to start a new project, my gate.
